title: Jai Bhim
plot: A determined lawyer fights for justice for marginalized people after a wrongful arrest.

title: Kaithi
plot: An ex-convict must navigate a dangerous night to protect innocent people and reunite with his family.
Two college sweethearts reunite at a nostalgic reunion and confront their unresolved past.

title: Pariyerum Perumal
plot: A young law student confronts caste-based discrimination while dreaming of a better future.

title: Soorarai Pottru
plot: An ambitious man strives to build an affordable airline despite powerful opposition.
